title: Eat 5 Fruits a Day
description: Challenge yourself to eat 5 different fruits every day for a week.

title: Try a New Fruit
description: Discover a new fruit you haven't tried before and incorporate it into your diet.

title: Fruit Smoothie Challenge
description: Make a delicious and nutritious fruit smoothie every day for a week.

title: Fruit Salad Challenge
description: Prepare a colorful and refreshing fruit salad for lunch or as a side dish for dinner.

title: Fruit Infused Water Challenge
description: Stay hydrated by drinking fruit-infused water throughout the day.
